string.value: There's an awesome Maplemas party going on in Happyville!
Extra extra! Happyville is holding an amazing party for Maplemas! For more details, please go see Rooney.
I talked to Rooney about the impending Maplemas party. Apparently it's a dress-up party, so I better go talk to Cliff about a possible potion for transformation.
I have good news for everyone! Happyville is holding a grand party to celebrate Maplemas! Are you interested?
Haha, I knew you would. For more details, you should go talk to Rooney.
Oh really? It's going to be really fun! That's too bad, but... if you want to change your mind, just let me know!
You must be eager to know what the party is all about. Here are the details. Ready?
It's a dress-up party that takes place in Happyville during the whole Maplemas period.

Go to Happyville, and you'll find a house with a huge chimney. The only way you can enter the house is actually through the chimney. The way you're dressed up right now, however, you won't be allowed in at all. You must be transformed into a new state.

You can get the transformation potion from Cliff in Happyville. I hear that if you give him 50 #t4032176#s, you'll be able to trade in for that potion. It'd be a good idea for you to have it prepared before seeing him.
Now hurry before you miss out on the party...
Please go see Rooney for more details on the Maplemas party.
